components.description:
A yellow face screaming in fear, depicted by wide, white eyes, a long, open mouth, hands pressed on cheeks, and a pale blue forehead, as if it has lost its color. Its expression evokes Edvard Munch’s iconic painting The Scream.

While intended to represent horror and fright, it commonly conveys such feelings as shock, awe, disbelief, and intense excitement, as a screaming fan.

Samsung’s design previously featured a ghost flying from its mouth. ðŸ™€ Weary Cat Face bears a similar expression.
components.title: Face Screaming in Fear

description:
A yellow face screaming in fear, depicted by wide, white eyes, a long, open mouth, hands pressed on cheeks, and a pale blue forehead, as if it has lost its color. Its expression evokes Edvard Munch’s iconic painting The Scream.

While intended to represent horror and fright, it commonly conveys such feelings as shock, awe, disbelief, and intense excitement, as a screaming fan.

Samsung’s design previously featured a ghost flying from its mouth. ðŸ™€ Weary Cat Face bears a similar expression.
title: Face Screaming in Fear

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: A screaming face with two hands holding the jaw and cheeks in fear. Wide eyes are shown with an open mouth. The Samsung version of this emoj http://emojipedia.org/face-screaming-in-fear/
emoji_net_data.name: face screaming in fear

bn:00096663a: Terrified; struck with amazement; showing signs of terror or horror.
Struck with fear, dread, or consternation
Struck with fear, dread, or consternation.

bn:00100634a: Producing an uneasy fearful sensation, as of things crawling over one's skin.
Causing a sensation as of things crawling on your skin.
Causing a sensation as of things crawling on your skin

bn:00097890a: Causing fear; of capable of causing fear; scary.
Causing fear or dread or terror
Oppressing with fear or horror; appalling, terrible.

bn:00082447v: To disturb with fear; to throw into a state of alarm or fright; to affright; to terrify.

bn:00093646v: (psychiatry) To cause a trauma in; as, to be traumatised by a childhood experience.

bn:00088675v: To open the mouth widely and take a long, deep breath because of tiredness or boredom.
To open the mouth widely and take a long, rather deep breath, often because one is tired and sometimes accompanied by pandiculation.
Open the mouth and take a deep breath.
To open wide; to display a gap.

bn:00082195v: To stress, single out as important
To stress, single out as important.

bn:00084388v: To cry out with a shrill voice; to utter a sudden, sharp outcry, or shrill, loud cry, as in fright or extreme pain; to shriek; to screech.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry, as in joy, triumph, or exultation, or to attract attention, to animate soldiers, etc.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry.
To speak with a loud, excited voice.
To utter in a loud or distinct voice.

bn:00088065v: Be afraid or feel anxious or apprehensive about a possible or probable situation or event

bn:00033854n: An emotion experienced in anticipation of some specific pain or danger (usually accompanied by a desire to flee or fight)
An emotion experienced in anticipation of some specific pain or danger.

Fear is an emotion induced by a threat perceived by living entities, which causes a change in brain and organ function and ultimately a change in behavior, such as running away, hiding or freezing from traumatic events.
Uncountable: emotion caused by actual or perceived danger or threat.
Basic emotion induced by a perceived threat
A strong, uncontrollable, unpleasant emotion caused by actual or perceived danger or threat.
Fear is a basic emotional sensation and response system initiated by an aversion to some perceived risk or threat.
A content descriptor developed by the Pan European Gaming Information (PEGI) and the British Board of Film Classification (BBFC).

bn:00040368n: Soul or spirit of a dead person or animal that can appear to the living
Ghosts, in traditional beliefs, are the souls or spirits of deceased persons or animals which can appear in visible forms or other manifestation, to the living.
A mental representation of some haunting experience
The disembodied spirit or soul of a deceased person
The disembodied soul; the soul or spirit of a deceased person; a spirit appearing after death; an apparition; a specter.
In traditional belief and fiction, a ghost is the soul or spirit of a dead person or animal that can appear, in visible form or other manifestation, to the living.

bn:00069841n: A shout, scream, yell, shriek, hoot, holler, vociferation, outcry, or bellow is a loud vocalisation in which air is passed through the vocal folds with greater force than is used in regular or close-distance vocalisation.

bn:00037439n: A short labored intake of breath with the mouth open
Sighs are especially audible, single exhalations of air out of the mouth or nose, that humans use to communicate emotion.
A short, sudden intake of breath.
Paralanguage is a component of meta-communication that may modify or nuance meaning, or convey emotion, such as prosody, pitch, volume, intonation etc.
The non-verbal elements of speech, and to a limited extent of writing, used to modify meaning and convey emotion, such as pitch, volume, and intonation.

apple_vendor_description: The face screaming in fear emoji on Apple devices is a dramatic portrayal of terror, characterized by Apple's signature bold lines, vibrant colors, and intense facial expression, enhanced by realistic lighting for maximum impact. Its wide-open mouth, contorted eyes, and perhaps hands clasped to its face convey overwhelming shock and fright, a common visual shorthand for extreme fear or surprise. On Apple devices, this emoji is perfect for expressing intense emotions, reacting to something shocking, or adding a hyperbolic element to a message.
